Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute near Austin/South Blvd
ShortDescription: NB 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via  Austin, Washington, Central, Corcoran and Austin: due to street blockage near Austin/South Blvd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted, in both directions, due to, street blockage near Austin/South Blvd.

Northbound buses will operate via Austin, Washington, Central, Corcoran and Austin.

Southbound buses will operate via Austin, Lake, Mayfield, Corcoran, Central, Washington and Austin.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute near Austin/South Blvd
ShortDescription: SB 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Lake, Mayfield, Corcoran, Central, Washington and Austin: due to street blockage near Austin/South Blvd.

Southbound buses will operate via Austin, Lake, Mayfield, Corcoran, Central, Washington and Austin.
